newsitem.title: FRANCE: Paris bourse shrugs off U.S. data.
newsitem.headline: Paris bourse shrugs off U.S. data.

text.p: French shares were lower in late trading after U.S. economic data that were neither bullish nor bearish for the stockmarket.
Economists said a 0.1 percent rise in the U.S. consumer price index for April and a 0.3 percent rise in the CPI excluding food and energy prices should not alarm the Fed.
U.S. industrial production was unchanged, and U.S. capacity utilisation was down slightly last month.
The CAC-40 index was down 6.28, or 0.23 percent, at 2,768.35 at 1325 GMT, off its session lows.
